## Work in progress
This manual is a work in progress. 
Until it is complete, please continue using LINKDATAGEN from
<https://bioinf.wehi.edu.au/software/linkdatagen/>.
:::


Many present and past members of the Bahlo lab have
contributed to the development of this software by suggesting improvements,
writing code and documentations and most of all using it. Special thanks go to:
Catherine Bromhead, Katherine Smith, Tom Scerri, Vesna Lukic and Rick Tankard.

For questions on LINKDATAGEN, please visit the [Github discussions page](https://github.com/bahlolab/linkdatagen/discussions).
For bug reports, please [submit an issue on Github](https://github.com/bahlolab/linkdatagen/issues). 
Alternatively, you may email <bahlo@wehi.edu.au>.
